layer.name: Sacrifice
layer.definition: Pour out for others with no expectation of return.

questions.text: Interceding for others at cost to myself (without expecting them to know) is ...

answers.4: regular — I invest significantly in intercession
answers.5: central — costly intercession is how I live
answers.3: moderate — I pray for others from surplus
answers.1: rare — I pray for myself mostly

questions.text: Sharing spiritual wisdom freely (even with those who may not follow through) is ...

answers.4: common — I give freely to most
answers.5: automatic — wisdom is meant to be given away
answers.2: selective — only for those who've earned it
answers.3: moderate — I share when I have surplus energy

questions.text: Investing spiritual time in people who cannot repay me is ...
questions.principle: Sacrifice targets those who cannot reciprocate

answers.4: regular — I intentionally serve the ungrateful
answers.5: prioritized — the least become the most important
answers.3: moderate — I give some time to the poor and difficult
answers.1: rare — I invest where there's return

questions.text: Pouring out spiritual energy when my own tank is low is ...
questions.principle: Sacrifice sometimes costs from limited reserves

answers.4: common — I often give beyond comfort
answers.5: normal — I pour out whether full or not
answers.3: occasional — when the need is clear
answers.1: not happening — I protect my reserves

questions.text: Having invested in people who rejected or betrayed me (and being willing to do it again) is ...
questions.principle: True sacrifice continues despite poor returns

answers.4: part of the cost — I keep investing
answers.5: expected — love always risks and I accept that
answers.3: real — but it's made me cautious
answers.1: not my experience — I don't invest that deeply

remediation.advice: Spiritual sacrifice means giving your spiritual resources without strings. If you only invest in people who reciprocate, appreciate, or succeed, you're trading, not sacrificing. Start with secret intercession — pray costly prayers for people who will never know.

scripture.text: Freely you have received; freely give.
